featureDescription.seq_next: number of events of navigating to next vertical (slide) before assignment
featureDescription.seq_next_post: number of events of navigating to next vertical (slide) after assignment
featureDescription.seq_prev: number of events of navigating to previous vertical (slide) before assignment
featureDescription.seq_prev_post: number of events of navigating to previous vertical (slide) after assignment
featureDescription.load_video: number of events of loading video before assignment
featureDescription.load_video_post: number of events of loading video after assignment
featureDescription.play_video: number of events of playing video before assignment
featureDescription.play_video_post: number of events of playing video after assignment
featureDescription.pause_video: number of events of pausing video before assignment
featureDescription.pause_video_post: number of events of pausing video after assignment
featureDescription.stop_video: number of events of stopping video before assignment
featureDescription.stop_video_post: number of events of stopping video after assignment
featureDescription.seek_forward: number of events of seeking video forward before assignment
featureDescription.seek_forward_post: number of events of seeking video forward after assignment
featureDescription.seek_backward: number of events of seeking video backward before assignment
featureDescription.seek_backward_post: number of events of seeking video backward after assignment
featureDescription.show_transcript: number of events of showing video transcript before assignment
featureDescription.show_transcript_post: number of events of showing video transcript after assignment
featureDescription.hide_transcript: number of events of hiding video transcript before assignment
featureDescription.hide_transcript_post: number of events of hiding video transcript after assignment
